name: Cove
description:
You're stranded on a small Island. You have 2 needs: hunger and thirst.
Each day you can choose between collecting water or fishing, you can't do both. Some days you will not be able to do an action.
You can make an offering to the gods to rewind time and go back a day to change your decision. Be careful though as you only have a limited amount of offerings!
Survive as long as possible without running out of food or water and await rescue! Good luck!

==========
Controls

Left Mouse Button - Interact with buttons
M - Mute/UnMute Music

==========
Information

Game created in Godot 3.2
2D Art created in Aseprite
3D Models created in Blender
Music created in Bosca Ceoil

Made as an entry for Brackeys Jam 2020.2
